# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we believe it would be a great asset to your endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. We are confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
